etymology.interpretation: Three young shoots combined evokes a profusion of grasses and herbs. Repetition emphasizes plurality, so the graph came to denote plants in general.

examples.chinese: 春天里(春天裡)，百卉齐放(百卉齊放)。
examples.pinyin: Chūntiān lǐ, bǎi huì qí fàng.
examples.english: In spring, hundreds of flowers and plants bloom.

examples.chinese: 这家花卉市场很大(這家花卉市場很大)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè jiā huāhuì shìchǎng hěn dà.
examples.english: This flower-and-plant market is very large.

examples.chinese: 他研究草卉与树木(他研究草卉與樹木)。
